li.label: Frozen Force
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} commands the bitter cold, striking with the icy power of winter. {PAWN_pronoun}'s attacks freeze the air itself, slowing enemies and shattering their defenses with cold precision.

li.label: Glacial Swiftness
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} moves with the silent grace of snow falling in the dead of winter. {PAWN_pronoun} strikes swiftly, leaving a trail of frost in {PAWN_possessive} wake as enemies are caught off guard.

li.label: Icy Dominion
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} exudes the aura of the frozen north, commanding even the fiercest creatures to submit. {PAWN_pronoun} bends the will of beasts with the unyielding force of winter's chill.

li.label: Permafrost Stamina
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} stands resolute against the harshest cold, immune to exhaustion and pain. Even in the darkest depths of winter, {PAWN_pronoun} pushes onward, a paragon of icy endurance.

li.label: Glacial Immunity
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} thrives in the extreme cold, untouched by toxins and filth. {PAWN_pronoun} walks through the harshest of conditions unscathed, like a glacier that withstands centuries of time.

li.label: Frozen Feast
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} uses the cold to preserve food, turning ice into sustenance. {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that nothing goes to waste, crafting meals that sustain allies through even the harshest winters.

li.label: Chilling Aura
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} emanates an aura of frost that chills the heart and sharpens resolve. {PAWN_pronoun}'s presence inspires loyalty and determination in those nearby, like the calm before a blizzard.

li.label: Chilled Restoration
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} heals with the precision of winter's touch, revitalizing the wounded with a calming cold that restores vitality. Even in the most frigid of times, {PAWN_pronoun} ensures that allies recover swiftly.

li.label: Frozen Bloom
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} nurtures the earth with the delicate touch of frost, fostering life even in the harshest of conditions. Wherever {PAWN_pronoun} treads, the cold brings forth new growth, flourishing in the wake of winter's embrace.
